snippet: The Carlyle Group said Thursday that it had acquired a 60 percent stake in Tok & Stok, a Brazilian furniture company, in a move that positions it to take advantage of the country's consumer retail market.
abstract: The Carlyle Group said Thursday that it had acquired a 60 percent stake in Tok & Stok, a Brazilian furniture company, in a move that positions it to take advantage of the country's consumer retail market.

headline.main: Carlyle Buys Controlling Stake in Brazilian Furniture Retailer
